title: Chelsea beaten 2-1 at West Ham, Aston Villa loses again
text: Chelsea beaten 2-1 at West Ham, Aston Villa loses again Saturday, 24 October 2015 (11 minutes ago) LONDON (AP) " Chelsea's poor Premier League form only got worse on Saturday with a 2-1 loss at West Ham that saw an angry Jose Mourinho sent to the stands.Mauro Zarate gave West Ham the lead before Gary Cahill equalized for 10-man...
